Review: Yes the shots, the set design, the rich symbolism were amazing but my favorite part of this movie was getting to share this viewing experience with my eldest son (I call him my little man LOL).

Threw this on for a room of screenagers today. We applied a critical lens and determined that 1) it was unacceptable to take those kids without the permission of their legal guardians and 2) that was a cavalier and thoroughly unnecessary way to distribute scalding hot chocolate
Im so glad New York City politics are no longer corrupt!
I got sufjanned right in my face

Movie: American Radical: The Trials of Norman Finkelstein

Review: So historically inaccurate! They didn’t even show the great oatmeal cook off between Oppenheimer and Einstein to determine who got the title of “Mr. Physics.” Well, what can you expect out of a big Hollywood movie?

Huge missed opportunity by the film’s creators not to start blasting Sinatra’s Theme from New York, New York when Hae Sung steps out of the yellow cab and into this crazy place I like to call the big apple

Took one of those naps during this one where you engage in a 9 round slug fest with your eyelids before succumbing to the sweetest of slumbers.The rest of the movie is a game of did I miss any key details? Am I still properly ENTHRALLED by the drama?
Not a good movie to watch with family eek. Also not a good idea to watch this entire thing with my hands in Fosse position.
A real “they don’t make em’ like this anymore” movie. If they made a movie about my experience with airports, it would be a documentary about how many plates of apps one guy can put away at Chili’s.

This movie was great but how was there not ONE reference to Brick Breaker? I mean would it have been so hard to have one of the engineers just be like hey look at this game I’m programming? I come from the generation of kids whose only quality time we got with our fathers was watching them slide that blue saucer to hit the bricks and in doing so break them. What about us?!
Watched this with my grandma after I absolutely wrecked her in 3 straight games of Rummikub
